name: Uniduck and the bear
description:
Uniduck and the bear is a game about a uniduck fearing the endless forest and it's dangers. The goal is to escape this spooky place to make the uniduck happy again. 

 The bear is it's worst enemy and may kill the player when touching. The uniduck is able to set traps to get rid of the bear.

The uniduck's special ability is to shoot with dices. They are useless against the bear, but very helpful against the dangerous spiders. They may kill the player too. The projectiles are dices and the number shown on hit, reveals the damage dealt to the opponent. 

On his path the finds keys to open the gates and to escape the forest. 

Who escapes is the glorious winner.

Controls:

  • Movement with keys: A S W D 
  • Set traps: Right click mouse
  • Shoot: Reft click mouse
